entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with wet snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023
